verbs.description: [ARG1: The Trump administration 's immigration " zero tolerance " policy] [R-ARG1: that] [V: results] [ARG2: in the separation of thousands of children from their families] stoked outrage over the weekend , and several prominent Republicans sounded off .

The Trump administration 's immigration " zero tolerance " policy that results in the separation of thousands of children from their families stoked outrage over the weekend , and [ARG1: several prominent Republicans] [V: sounded] off .
